downloadDescription: Certificate bundle containing intermediate certificates for endpoint security and TLS authentication for Microsoft 365 Worldwide customers.
detailsSection:
Certificate bundle containing intermediate certificates for endpoint security and TLS authentication for Microsoft 365 Worldwide customers. This bundle is an aggregate of the Office 365 Certificate Chain bundles at https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/encryption-office-365-certificate-chains.

Last updated: 9/29/2020
installInstructionSection: Install the certificate bundle to computers used to connect to Microsoft 365 endpoints.
